alert.note: Alert for Clark; Ford; Hodgeman (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued April 02 at 1:17PM CDT until April 04 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph possible. * WHERE...Hodgeman, Ford and Clark Counties. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning through Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Isolated power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Minor structural damage is possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Widespread blowing dust is expected, and will reduce visibility. Sharply reduced visibility down to one quarter mile is possible locally.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
